---
id: CancelOrder
title: Cancel Order
sidebar_label: Cancel Order
sidebar_position: 3
---

**Type:** DELETE

**Description:** `/spot/v4/order/{orderId}`

### Limit Flow Rules

10/s/apikey

### Parameters

| Name      | Type   | Mandatory | Default | Description |
| --------- | ------ | --------- | ------- | ----------- |
| `orderId` | number | Yes       |         | Order ID    |

### Response Example

```json title="Response"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "cancelId": "6216559590087220004"
  }
}
```
